headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Rewriting The Baxter International (BAX) Investment Story
summary: Baxter International’s latest valuation update reflects a slightly lower fair value estimate, trimmed from about US$23.80 to about US$23.13 per share, as analysts weigh mixed signals around guidance, execution and recovery potential. The modest adjustment in the model, alongside a small tweak to the discount rate and long run revenue growth assumption, captures how recent bullish and bearish research has converged toward a more balanced view of risk and opportunity already reflected in the...

headline: Assessing Baxter International (BAX) Valuation After Mixed Short And Long Term Shareholder Returns
summary: Why Baxter International (BAX) Is On Investors’ Radar Today Baxter International (BAX) has drawn interest after a recent stretch where its shares show mixed performance across different timeframes. This has prompted investors to reassess the company’s valuation, risk profile, and growth ambitions in healthcare products. See our latest analysis for Baxter International. At a share price of US$20.11, Baxter has seen a 6.1% 1 month share price return but a 12.3% 3 month share price decline. Its...
